goals__remit:
SOIB is the public administration entitled to design, execute, monitor and assess active labour market policies in Balearic Islands -Spain-. 
 
Law 7/2000 on SOIB regulates the composition, functions, procedures and resources. It is enacted that SOIB functions are: 
•    Registered unemployment and underemployment 
•    Registered labour contracts 
•    Job searching assistance 
•    Management of vacancies registered 
•    Counselling and guidance 
•    Vocational Education Training, dual training, apprenticeships and work-based learning programmes 
•    Public employment programmes 
•    Subsidizing employment 
•    Entrepreneur Assistance 
•    Management of EURES network in Balearic Islands 
•    Provision of labour statistics
position: Director General of Employment and Economy
